title: (x) Cisco "Human Network" corporate sans - Cisco (proprietary font) {Brett Jordan}
content:
Cisco uses it their new human network campaign... I have no clue what it is though

[http://www.cisco.com/web/thehumannetwork/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140302110843/http:/www.cisco.com/web/thehumannetwork/index.html "http://www.cisco.com/web/thehumannetwork/index.html")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140302110843im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mod_hdr_welcome_5599.gif)

Thank You

Mikey
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content: it's their own typeface, cisco light... a clean folio/helvetica hybrid... i can see why stephen says univers, but the 'straight' top to the lower case 't' shows it's not

Thank you Brett and Coles... too bad its exclusive though. :-(

Mikey

There are plenty of [alternatives](http://web.archive.org/web/20140302110843/http:/www.fontshop.com/virtual/newsletters/feb2007_a/) in this genre.  
+ [Galaxie Polaris](http://web.archive.org/web/20140302110843/http:/vllg.com/Village/GalaxiePolaris/mudTyper+Weights/) + [Neutral](http://web.archive.org/web/20140302110843/http:/www.bpfoundry.com/bp/fonts/cuts.htm?font=neutralbp) + [Akkurat](http://web.archive.org/web/20140302110843/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/)
